annotations.description: This is a simple (awesome) cocktail unearthed by David Wondrich in a 1937 Book published by Esquire Magazine and was first published by Broadway Press agent ...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Junior

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Rittenhouse Rye
.5oz (15ml) Benedictine
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
1 Dash Angostura Bitters

Shake and pour

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K5etSYGTde4
title: Junior
